name: Sam Altman
title: CEO & Co-Founder

source_links.title: Exclusive Interview: OpenAI's Sam Altman Talks ChatGPT

twitter_summary: OpenAI has made several significant updates, including the launch of BrowseComp, a new benchmark for evaluating AI intelligence. They have improved memory features in ChatGPT, allowing it to reference past conversations, and are rolling out this feature to pro users. The company is also launching the OpenAI Pioneers program to partner with companies for advanced AI product development. There is a notable increase in OpenAI's usage, and the company is actively working on enhancing service speed and addressing rate limits. Additionally, they are focusing on strategic deployment to transform the economy with AI.
